testcase.name: 3 Order a product
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: 3 Order a product Given I am on the Demo Login Page ... passed in 9.069s When I fill the account information for account StandardUser into the Username field and the Password field ... passed in 0.577s And I click the Login Button ... passed in 0.222s Then I am redirected to the Demo Main Page ... passed in 0.014s And I verify the App Logo exists ... passed in 0.052s When user sorts products from high price to low price ... passed in 0.193s And user adds highest priced product ... passed in 0.114s And user clicks on cart ... passed in 0.123s And user clicks on checkout ... passed in 0.123s And user enters first name Alice ... passed in 0.177s And user enters last name Doe ... passed in 0.149s And user enters zip code 592 ... passed in 0.156s And user clicks Continue button ... passed in 0.153s Then I verify in Checkout overview page if the total amount for the added item is $49.99 ... passed in 0.058s When user clicks Finish button ... passed in 0.117s Then Thank You header is shown in Checkout Complete page ... passed in 0.047s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
